1.content: Double-D has created a size change ray. When he shows Ed and Eddy it, they get evil grins. "Who should we change?", says eddy."I think we should get back at kevin for all these years of torment!" "I agree" said ed. " Edd tried to change their minds, but Eddy threatened to make him small.
1.title: what to do

11.content: They find kevin cleanig his yard. "What do you dorks want?", asked kevin. "We just want to see how you want to be punished." Eddy fired the gun and instantly kevin shrank to 1/2 inch tall."What happened to me?" Ed looked at kevin and laughed. Eddy said, "Kevin, we are going to get payback on you for years of torment!" I think Ed has just the thing. "Ed, show him "the pit". Kevin weakly backs away. "The pit is a terrible place for bad kids, like you kevin!" Ed slowly took off his jacket and t-shirt to reveal an undershirt with giant pit stains. "Ed has been working out without taking showers lately." Kevin trys to hold his breath, but succumbs to the smell. "You reek, dork!"Ed picked up tiny kevin and brought him to Eddy's face. " Well, you're going to reek to after spending time in there." Kevin nearly fainted from Eddy's tuna breath. So, whats it gonna be , twerp?
11.title: find kevin

111.content: "I think you'll take the pits." Kevin cowardly ran, but eddy's foot was there to stop him."Don't run away, kev, cause we'll find you." Ed picked Kevin up and carefully placed him in his pit. Kevin started yelling when put his arm down. "Who should we shrink now?"

Eddy looked at her and said, "If you tell anyone, you'll end up as a red blot on your brothers pants. Or worse.""We control you now and you can't stop us."act good, and you'll live, act bad, and ed will personally use you as tp. your first task is to clea me from head to toe. start with my hair and go down.how does it work out?

11113.content: After 6 hours of Sarah cleaning, Eddy noticed she wasn't moving. He looked in his boxers, and saw Sarah just laying there. "Sarah? Hello?" No response. " Uh... Ed? I think I killed Sarah." "What? How?, said Ed in confusion. " Well, she was in my boxers and..." "Wait, stop right there. I understand." said Ed. " What happened?" Eddy said confused. "Isn't it obvious, she suffocated in the stench down there. Eddy said, " Ha, she couldn't handle my stench" He grabbed her body and crushed it under foot.

1311.content: "Your punishment is to rub my feet. A word of warning, though, I haven't washed my socks in 2 years. And get used to the taste of sweat, because I am not giving you water." Eddy removes his shoes, unleashing a wave of stench, causing all the kids to retch and gag. "If anyone tries to escape, the "detention center" is in Ed's armpit. So think before you try anything. Plus, our new death penalty is death by fart." Kevin began rubbing the damp, musty, sock clad foot. After a few hours, tensions started to rise. They broke when Johnny attacked Eddy with a water balloon filled with hot sauce. Eddy grabbed Johnny and punished him with....
1311.title: punish you

13111.content: "You were warned of the consequences. Your punishment is Death. you have one day to make your goodbyes to your friends." As the sun rose in the sky the next day, everyone locked their doors and watched as Johnny took his last steps toward the middle of the cul-de-sac. Eddy stood motionless and said, "Johnny, are you ready?" Johnny answered, "Yes", but softly sobbing as he did. Eddy dug the hole and had johnny lay in it. Eddy sat over the hole and got ready. Eddy let loose the loudest, smelliest fart ever. Houses shook, windows broke, and electrical poles fell. After the cloud cleared, Eddy stood up, revealing a large, deep crater, and a skeleton. The next day, the kids gathered around the crater. Eddy released Kevin from his work duty to go and stand. what happened next was....
13111.title: Death

131111.content: Kevin rallied the kids together at his house and tried to devise a rebellion against their giant overlords. The kids listened, but coughed because Kevin smelled heavily of sweaty feet. "We need to avenge johnny, and I would rather die, then get stuck as an armpit or foot slave forever, so who's with me?" They all shouted yes. the plan was..........
131111.title: the kids start a rebellion

1311111.content: Everyday for a month, the kids gathered in Kevin's garage and secretly built weapons to fight off the giant Eds. Kevin built a custom Jawbreaker launcher, while other built automatic wood flingers. Rolf began training his animals to fight and what to target. The rebels were ready to put up a good fight. The day finally came to strike back at their tall, smelly masters. The battle begins...
1311111.title: secretly build weapons

13111111.content: Kevin fires the first shot at Eddy's head, causing a welt to appear. All three Eds stand and attack. Kevin continues to fire, while the others take position and open fire. Eddy breathes his horrible breath on his attackers, nearly incapacitating some. Double D, who everyone thought was hygenic, takes off his shoes, and releases a foot odor like none other. Ed, the least hygenic one, raises his arms, revealing large pit stains. He then removes his coat, revealing his sweat dripping pits. Rolf throws a chicken/bomb at Ed, who picks it up and is burned by the explosion. Rolf pulls out a long silver sword, and jumps on Victor the Goat. He charges at Eddy and yells, "For the honor of my ancestors!" He strikes Eddy's bare leg, opening a large, bleeding wound. As Rolf falls back, Eddy tumbles to the ground in pain. As Eddy lays there defenseless, Kevin takes 5 well placed shots on his head. Edd pins Kevin down with his smelly foot and says, "Enjoy this smell, it's the smell of de-feet." Kevin fires 2 shots at his eyes, blinding him, and giving Kev some time to escape.Eddy is slowly dying of blood loss. Rolf charges at him through the red pool and impales Eddy's head, killing him. Ed grabs Jimmy says, "You know what I need, a new gel deodorant. Maybe one with essence of Jimmy." With that, he squishes Jimmy into a red paste, then spits in his remains and begins to rub them in his pits. Sarah watches in horror as her friend becomes deodorant. She fires her home made shotgun at his waist, causing him to fall and wince in pain. How is the kid's battle report.....
13111111.title: the battle

131111112.content: The battle report is pretty bad. Kevin broke both legs when Edd stepped on him. Rolf got a nasty chest cut from Eddy's razor sharp hair. Sarah has aniexty problems now . Naz, who was a defensive sniper, took in an almost lethal dose of Eddy's breath. And Jimmy, poor Jimmy, was crushed in Ed's sweaty, greasy armpit. How is the Eds' report
131111112.title: Bad

1311111122.content: The Ed's' report is pretty bad as well. Ed has a severe burn on his left hand and nasty gash from a sniper's bullet. Edd lost sight in one eye and lost a good deal of blood. Eddy took three stab wounds, 15 Jawbreaker shots, and one final sword blow to the head. Eddy is still laying dead in the cul-de-sac.what now..........
1311111122.title: Bad

13111111221.content: "Guys, this may sound foolish, but we should negotiate peace with the Eds.", said Kevin. The kids sent the three leaders, Kevin, Rolf, and Naz to make a treaty. When the three arrived at the meeting place, the Eds were there. " Hey tinies, we showed up, now cut to the part about the deal.", said Ed. "Our deal is that you two do not kill anyone else, and Kevin will be your eternal slave.", said Rolf. Kevin reluctantly agreed, and the Eds accepted. Ed yelled,"I hope you like pits Kevin!"

"I swear I'm telling the truth", Nazz screamed as she hung upside down between two of Eddy's greasy fingers.
"We don't believe that you would just give up. You were put up to this by Kevin weren't you?
"No, I just wanted to live. Kevin is an idiot who will get every kid in the culdesac killed."
"Well, maybe he'll see this as a message.", said Eddy. With that, he announced to the neighborhood, "I caught your spy. Very nice trick trying to use Nazz. Now you will see the error of your ways."
Eddy pulled down his jeans, revealing a very stained pair of boxers. He placed Nazz on the ground and told her to close her eyes. She listened, but began to weep. Eddy postioned himself over her perfectly, and sat down. Nazz was unfornuately crushed in the worst possible way: under a teen boy's unwashed butt. When he stood back up, he peeled what remained off his boxers, and ate it. Many who watched cried in fear, while Kevin shed a small tear. He quickly wiped it away, and vowed revenge. 132.content:
Eddy looked down and saw sarah.
"a yelling ant, thats new."
"Stop growing!", yelled Sarah, who was nothing more than a talking speck.
Eddy raised his foot above her and said, "Ants have only one purpose in my eyes: to be squished by a larger force." With that, he brought down his foot, crushing her into a red smear on the ground.
Ed did not care at all that his little sister just got squished.
"aaaah!" A voice yelled. Who was it?
